mapper.insert: insert into tb_hxp_article_content (id, article_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, is_deleted, article_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tb_hxp_article_content set article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, article_content = #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, article_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, is_deleted, article_content from tb_hxp_article_content where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, article_id, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, is_deleted, article_content from tb_hxp_article_content order by create_date desc
